tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SwimmingLessons (
    lesson_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lesson_name VARCHAR(50),
    lesson_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    instructor_id INT,
    student_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE swimming_lesson_schedule (
  lesson_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lesson_date DATE,
  lesson_time TIME,
  lesson_location VARCHAR(100),
  instructor_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE instructor_availability (
  instructor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  instructor_name VARCHAR(100),
  available_date DATE,
  available_time TIME,
  instructor_specialty VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE lesson_schedules (
    schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    lesson_date DATE,
    lesson_time TIME,
    instructor_id INT,
    student_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE instructor_availability (
    instructor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    instructor_name VARCHAR(50),
    availability_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE swimming_lessons (
    lesson_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lesson_date DATE,
    lesson_time TIME,
    instructor_id INT,
    student_id INT
);
CREATE TABLE lesson_schedule (lesson_id INT PRIMARY KEY, lesson_date DATE, lesson_time TIME, lesson_location VARCHAR(50), instructor_id INT, student_id INT);
CREATE TABLE instructor_availability (instructor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, instructor_name VARCHAR(50), available_date DATE, available_time TIME);
CREATE TABLE student_progress (progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY, student_id INT, lesson_id INT, progress_rating INT, progress_notes TEXT);
CREATE TABLE student (student_id INT PRIMARY KEY, student_name VARCHAR(50), student_age INT, student_level VARCHAR(20));
CREATE TABLE instructor (instructor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, instructor_name VARCHAR(50), instructor_specialty VARCHAR(50));
